languages.text: Отдаленно это существо похоже на гемункула, но вблизи скорее напоминает его неудачную карикатуру.

traits.locale_text: Отдаленно это существо похоже на гемункула, но вблизи скорее напоминает его неудачную карикатуру.

languages.text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.
languages.original_text: Отдаленно это существо похоже на гемункула, но вблизи скорее напоминает его неудачную карикатуру.

traits.locale_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but at a closer look, it's more of a bad caricature of one.
From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but at a closer look, it's more of a bad caricature of one.
From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but at a closer look, it's more of a bad caricature of one.
From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but at a closer look, it's more of a bad caricature of one.
From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.
From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

languages.text: 从远处看，这只生物看起来就像血伶人本人一样，但仔细观察的话，它似乎更像是拙劣的仿制品。
languages.original_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

traits.locale_text: 从远处看，这只生物看起来就像血伶人本人一样，但离近观察，它看起来更像是拙劣的仿制品。

languages.text: Aus der Ferne ähnelt die Kreatur einem Haemonculus, doch bei näherer Betrachtung ist sie eher eine schlechte Karikatur eines solchen.
languages.original_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

traits.locale_text: Aus der Ferne ähnelt die Kreatur einem Haemonculus, doch bei näherer Betrachtung ist sie eher eine schlechte Karikatur eines solchen.

languages.text: A cierta distancia la criatura parece un hemónculo, pero al examinarla más de cerca descubres que es más bien como una mala caricatura de uno.
languages.original_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

traits.locale_text: A cierta distancia la criatura parece un hemónculo, pero al examinarla más de cerca descubres que es más bien como una mala caricatura de uno.

languages.text: De loin, la créature rappelle un hémoncule. Toutefois, lorsqu'on l'observe de plus près, elle ressemble davantage à une mauvaise caricature de l'un de ces êtres.
languages.original_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

traits.locale_text: De loin, la créature rappelle un hémoncule. Lorsqu'on l'observe de plus près, cependant, elle ressemble davantage à une mauvaise caricature de l'un de ces êtres.

languages.text: 遠くから見るとハモンキュラスに似ているが、よく見てみると、むしろハモンキュラスの悪い風刺画のようだ。
languages.original_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

traits.locale_text: 遠くから見るとハモンキュラスに似ているが、よく見ると、むしろハモンキュラスの悪い風刺画のようだ。

languages.text: İlk bakışta bir Haimonkulus'u andıran bu yaratığın, daha iyi incelendiğinde başarısız bir deneme olduğu anlaşılıyor.
languages.original_text: From a distance, the creature resembles a Haemonculus, but upon closer inspection, it is more like a bad caricature of one.

traits.locale_text: İlk bakışta bir Haimonkulus'u andıran bu yaratığın, daha iyi incelendiğinde başarısız bir deneme olduğu anlaşılıyor.
